amendment.description: Amendment requires the Secretary of Health and Human Services to study and report to Congress on the correlation between a perpetrator's drug and alcohol abuse and the reported incidence of violence at domestic violence shelters.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 109-236 to require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to report to Congress on the correlation between a perpetrator's drug and alcohol abuse and the reported incidence of violence at domestic violence shelters.

action.text: Amendment (A008) offered by Ms. Brown-Waite, Ginny.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brown-Waite, Ginny amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
